title: Aleksandr Marchenko (footballer)
text:
Aleksandr Aleksandrovich Marchenko (; born 3 February 1996) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Biolog-Novokubansk">FC Biolog-Novokubansk</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Krasnodar-2">FC Krasnodar-2</a> on 12 July 2013 in a game against <a href="FC%20Chernomorets%20Novorossiysk">FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk</a>.
He made his debut for the senior squad of <a href="FC%20Krasnodar">FC Krasnodar</a> on 30 October 2013 in a <a href="Russian%20Cup%20%28football%29">Russian Cup</a> game against <a href="FSC%20Dolgoprudny">FSC Dolgoprudny</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="PFC%20Spartak%20Nalchik">PFC Spartak Nalchik</a> on 6 August 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20Yenisey%20Krasnoyarsk">FC Yenisey Krasnoyarsk</a>.
